price: 181. »Dad la medida justa (cuando comerciéis) y no causéis pérdidas a los demás (haciendo trampas).
arabic: ۞ أَوۡفُواْ ٱلۡكَيۡلَ وَلَا تَكُونُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡمُخۡسِرِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: awfū al-kayla walā takūnū mina al-mukh'sirīna
